name: eduportal-integration
description: Educational Portal with Student, Faculty, and Admin frontends integrated with Django backend

scripts.install:all: cd studentfrontend && npm install && cd ../adminfrontend && npm install && cd ../facultyfrontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd studentfrontend && npm run build && cd ../adminfrontend && npm run build && cd ../facultyfrontend && npm run build

author: EduPortal Team
